notes_display: Edge is a chronogram composed by Friedrich Kleinert and reads: SIC SOL CRESCENTES DECEDENS DVPLICAT VMBRAS VIRG . (Thus the setting sun lengthens the increasing shadows. -comp. Virgil, Eclog. ii. 67) White metal with copper plug.
issue_obverse_figure_description_s: Scene celebrating relief of Barcelona and flight of Philip V to French border.  The king's crown is shown falling from his head.  Angel depicted as covering the sun's rays.
issue_obverse_legend_s: SOLIS ECLIPSIS . D . 12 . MAI . | BARCELLONA OBSIDIONE LIBE . | RATA PHILIPPO ANDEGAV . | EX HISP . FVGATO .
issue_reverse_figure_description_s: Duke of Marlborough is depicted on horseback in battle with fallen enemy soldiers beneath.  Scene celebrates the promptitude and impetuousness of the Duke in battle.
issue_reverse_legend_s: VICTORIARVM IMPETVS | SVB DUCE MARLEBVRG . VICTORE | PERPETVO . GALL . PROFLIGATIS | BRABANTIA ET FLANDRIA | EREPTÆ | MDCCVI .
